channel.title: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?
channel.description:
Hey, I added in a new item with:
[code] <ItemDef> <name>Godly iron battle Axe</name> #1329 <description>A vicious looking axe</description> <command></command> <sprite>84</sprite> <basePrice>182</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>true</wieldable> <pictureMask>15654365</pictureMask> </ItemDef> [/code] [code] <entry> <int>1329</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>110</sprite> <type>16</type> <wieldPos>4</wieldPos> <armourPoints>9</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>18</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>22</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>9</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>9</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>9</rangePoints> <requiredStats> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> [/code]
And yes I modified Items.rscd as well. MY only problem is, is that if I edit a character file to have the item, they cannot login and if I try to summon the item using "::item 1329" I get invalid item ID. So is there something I need to do to expand the item array?

item.title: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @TheGuyWhoGotOn TheGuyWhoGotOn
item.description:
@TheGuyWhoGotOn wrote:

I don’t know. Have you copied your changes to the client-side too? ItemDef.xml.gz (server) needs to be identical to Items.rscd (client) for it to work properly.

Yeah I did, because the new R2H isn’t in the client by default but I can use it after modifying Items.rscd. I’ll look everything over again…Where does it defice how large the array is? (In the source code)

Read full topic
item.source: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?

item.title: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @TheGuyWhoGotOn TheGuyWhoGotOn
item.description:
@TheGuyWhoGotOn wrote:

Believe me, I don’t desire to see your XML files, but a R2H should be ID 81. I’m not sure what exactly you’re working from or what you’re doing but if done properly a R2H shouldn’t be ID 1328.

So on the topic of item 1328 being a modded r2h why can I not use my item 1329 which is a modded iron battle axe?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?

item.title: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

What made you think I cared when you originally mentioned it?

The fact that you came back with the exact same thing as I said as a comeback.

In case you don’t understand - “tear if you don’t care about me, tear then i don’t care about you!!”.
[center] This is not your school playground. If you have nothing useful to contribute towards a thread, do not post in it.[/center]
[center] More than half of your last 20 posts have been a personal attack that tries to elicit a reaction from the other party. I will not tolerate that level of immaturity on these boards. You are not contributing any useful discussion, so I see no reason to continue to allow you to post here.[/center]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

TheGuyWhoGotOn, the R2H with the id of 1328 is a modded R2H.

item.source: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?

item.title: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @TheGuyWhoGotOn TheGuyWhoGotOn
item.description:
@TheGuyWhoGotOn wrote:

In ItemDef.xml and Items.RSCD it goes by order. Look at the very last item and look at the ID. When you then add another item at the bottom the ID will be 1 higher than the previous last item. Leave ItemWieldableDef.xml the same until you have that figured out. You must have over 35 custom items if the ID was really 1329.

I counted them, 1328 is a Rune 2H which I can summon. If you desire I could upload my files.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?

item.title: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @TheGuyWhoGotOn TheGuyWhoGotOn
item.description:
@TheGuyWhoGotOn wrote:

Hey, I added in a new item with:

  <ItemDef>
    <name>Godly iron battle Axe</name> #1329
    <description>A vicious looking axe</description>
    <command></command>
    <sprite>84</sprite>
    <basePrice>182</basePrice>
    <stackable>false</stackable>
    <wieldable>true</wieldable>
    <pictureMask>15654365</pictureMask>
  </ItemDef>
	<entry>
		<int>1329</int>
		<ItemWieldableDef>
			<sprite>110</sprite>
			<type>16</type>
			<wieldPos>4</wieldPos>
			<armourPoints>9</armourPoints>
			<weaponAimPoints>18</weaponAimPoints>
			<weaponPowerPoints>22</weaponPowerPoints>
			<magicPoints>9</magicPoints>
			<prayerPoints>9</prayerPoints>
			<rangePoints>9</rangePoints>
			<requiredStats>
			</requiredStats>
			<femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly>
		</ItemWieldableDef>
	</entry>

And yes I modified Items.rscd as well. MY only problem is, is that if I edit a character file to have the item, they cannot login and if I try to summon the item using “::item 1329” I get invalid item ID. So is there something I need to do to expand the item array?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you expand the item array in EasyRSC?
